item.description:
Venez

... boire un coup, ou manger un bout.
... faire la connaissance d'autres francophones.
... profiter d'une discussion en français avec des amis.
… accueillir de nouveaux membres au groupe (Paul et Barbara, peut-être encore plus !).
... fêter l'anniversaire de votre organisatrice courageuse (quelques jours en avance, d'accord?).

Venez nous rejoindre!

Dover Soul is a couple of blocks south of the Cafe, same side of the street. Central Ave. is one way here, so if you're coming FROM THE SOUTH (Spaulding Tpk, Exit 7 or 8), you'll have to U-turn in Dover's downtown "square" (which is actually triangle-shaped!). See the Dover Soul website for detailed driving directions.

Park on Central Avenue in front of the place (avoid the new "30 minute" spots!), or turn right just after Dover Soul onto Orchard Street and park in a PUBLIC lot on the right (metered spots are free in the evening). Avoid permit-only spots!

ATTENTION ! Dover Soul is two venues in one. We'll attempt to meet at the rear of the martini bar (right side of Dover Soul -- walk in, go to the back, and turn right). On se verra de toute façon ... il n'est pas assez grand que ça.

For more information, see http://www.doversoul....

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group
